      • print

        public void print(java.lang.String da_type,
                  java.io.PrintStream out)
           throws PrismException
        Print the DA in v2 format to the output stream. This functions expects that the DA is compact.
        Parameters:
        da_type - a string specifying the type of automaton ("DRA", "DSA").
        out - the output stream
        Throws:
        PrismException
